sections.heading: Unlawful act of officer; liability of council9-255
sections.text: Unlawful act of officer; liability of councilA member of the common council of a town incorporated under the provisions of this article shall not be personally liable in damages or otherwise for an unlawful act of an officer or employee of the town,

sections.heading: act of officer; liability of council
